content:
path /v3/flow/block/hash
operationId FlowGetBlock
parameters
description Block hash or height
in path
name hash
required True
schema
type string
summary Get Flow Block by hash or height
description 1 credit per API callGet Flow Block detail by block hash or height

200
FlowBlock
type object
properties
id
description The hash of the block
type string
parentId
description The hash of the parent block
type string
height
description The number of the block
type number
timestamp
description The timestamp of the block
type string
collectionGuarantees
description Collection guaranties
type array
items
type object
collectionId
type string
description The collection guarantee
blockSeals
description Block seals
type array
items
type object
properties
blockId
type string
description The ID of the block being sealed
executionReceiptId
type string
description The ID of the execution receipt being sealed
transactions
description The IDs of transactions
type string
description OK
